title: Print, ca. 1788
inscribed:
Lower left to lower left center: Urne d'un Fragment Antique qui est au Museum du Duc Salviati a Florence///Aubert P. fecit.

Lower center: Vase de Composition pose sur un Tombeau antique tel qui se voit à la Ville Madame à un mille de Rome, maison de Plaisance de la Princesse de Medicis depuis Reine de France connu sous le nom de Catherine Femme de Henri II
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: At center is a large vase upon a pedestal flanked by an urn on the left and a harp and three legged bowl on the right

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, ca. 1788.
ca. 1788. Sheet: 17.3 x 11.5 cm (6 13/16 x 4 1/2 in.). Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-228-6.
